objects.description: [TEMP.Veles](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0088) has used a publicly-available PowerShell-based tool, WMImplant. The group has also used PowerShell to perform [Timestomp](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1099)ing.

external_references.description: FireEye Intelligence . (2018, October 23). TRITON Attribution: Russian Government-Owned Lab Most Likely Built Custom Intrusion Tools for TRITON Attackers. Retrieved April 16, 2019.
Miller, S, et al. (2019, April 10). TRITON Actor TTP Profile, Custom Attack Tools, Detections, and ATT&CK Mapping. Retrieved April 16, 2019.
